name: Project Sophie
description:
A short demo level for an upcoming project, made for Metroidvania Month. Story elements are not present in this demo, but keep reading to find out more.

The game's story is about a girl named Sophie who one day was suddenly able to see ghosts. This rare power caused her to leave her hometown in order to enter special training. The story takes place a couple years afterward, when Sophie is a capable spirit tamer who can be sent on missions on behalf of her organization. Something is causing malicious spirits to act up, and it is her job to pacify them with the assistance of her ghost helpers. However, she finds herself in a self-reflective journey in which she must confront her loneliness and dependence on others. 

We are a small, inexperienced team so making this prototype is a huge milestone for us. We hope you will stick around for updates!
